mapper.select: SELECT t1.ID, t1.COMBINATION_PROJECT_ID, t2.COMBIN_PROJECT_CODE, t2.COMBIN_PROJECT_NAME, t1.PROJECT_TYPE, t1.PROJECT_REQUIRED_TYPE FROM TJ_REG_COMBINATION_PROJECT t1 LEFT JOIN TJ_COMBINATION_PROJECT t2 ON t1.COMBINATION_PROJECT_ID = t2.ID where t1.DEL_FLAG ='0' and t2.DEL_FLAG ='0' and t1.CHECK_STATUS = #{bo.checkStatus}
